# FreeSaveVideo

> FreeSaveVideo is a browser-based media downloader and toolkit with localized pages, platform-specific landing pages, guides, and FAQs.

## Canonical Site
- https://freesavevideo.online/

## Discovery
- Robots: https://freesavevideo.online/robots.txt
- Sitemap: https://freesavevideo.online/sitemap.xml
- LLM file: https://freesavevideo.online/llms.txt
- LLM alias: https://freesavevideo.online/llm.txt
- Well-known alias: https://freesavevideo.online/.well-known/llms.txt

## Language Entry Points
- de: https://freesavevideo.online/de
- en: https://freesavevideo.online/en
- es: https://freesavevideo.online/es
- fr: https://freesavevideo.online/fr
- ja: https://freesavevideo.online/ja
- ko: https://freesavevideo.online/ko
- ru: https://freesavevideo.online/ru
- th: https://freesavevideo.online/th
- vi: https://freesavevideo.online/vi
- zh: https://freesavevideo.online/zh

## Key Public Pages
- FAQ (en): https://freesavevideo.online/en/faq
- FAQ (zh): https://freesavevideo.online/zh/faq
- Guide index (en): https://freesavevideo.online/en/guide
- Guide index (zh): https://freesavevideo.online/zh/guide
- Discover (en): https://freesavevideo.online/en/discover
- Discover (zh): https://freesavevideo.online/zh/discover

## API
- Base URL: https://api.freesavevideo.online/
- Health: https://api.freesavevideo.online/health
- WebSocket health: https://api.freesavevideo.online/ws/health

## Policy Notes
- Public informational pages are intended to be indexed and retrieved.
- Private or admin-only pages are not intended for search indexing.
